Name: Elite School Roof Club
About the game: Welcome to Elite School Roof Club! Elite School Roof Club is a visual novel/RPG/literally every genre game in which you have the super duper tricky task of.... Raising the Roof! It is a parody of the classic trope of 'school visual novel', and takes crazy turns that no other visual novel you have played before will! That's right! A new building in the Elite School needs funding, and you as Kenn need to go around to raise donations! As with every school raising money for a new wing, there's bound to be many demons to fight and universes to conquest. Along the way you may need to: Steal. Traverse Space-Time and fight a extra terrestrial beings Travel to the future and instantly die Become God itself Do your final exams while being a 42 year old man (canon) Divorce your wife Funny arrow music game! Get Real Beat all 100 achievements (plus the 80+ more in-game ones) and spend 10 hours 100%-ing the game Steal fish Plus much more! Right as of this moment, the full version of Chapter 1 is playable, with some of Chapter 2 too! More is to come in future, regular updates! Explore all the available routes in the game... You may find things even we weren't expecting... Enjoy raising the roof!
